arts.sum: Reigning champions Bayer Leverkusen snatched a 4-3 win at VfB Stuttgart with two late goals on Sunday to snap a three-game losing run in all competitions and cut Bayern Munich's lead atop the Bundesliga to six points. Patrik Schick struck in stoppage time to give the visitors the points after they had drawn level minutes earlier courtesy of Stuttgart midfielder Angelo Stiller's 88th-minute own goal.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen rediscovers its late-goal magic in a 4-3 comeback win over Stuttgart in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen rediscovered some of the late-goal magic from its title-winning season as Patrik Schick’s added-time header sealed a 4-3 comeback win over Stuttgart in the Bundesliga on Sunday. Jeremie Frimpong then crossed for Schick to head in the winning goal in the fourth minute of added time.

arts.ttl: Patrik Schick completes remarkable Bayer Leverkusen reversal against stunned Stuttgart
arts.sum: Nick Woltemade (r.) and Ermedin Demirović celebrate Stuttgart's second goal - IMAGO/kolbert-press/ Martin Agüera Bayer Leverkusen revived their Bundesliga title aspirations by completing a trademark late victory with a Patrik Schick injury-time winner having previously trailed 3-1 against Stuttgart.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | VfB Stuttgart 3-4 Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: In a must-win game to close the gap to six points on Bayern Munich, Bayer Leverkusen did not make it easy for themselves but came from 3-1 down to beat…

arts.ttl: Leverkusen break Stuttgart hearts in a familiar fashion
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen came from 3-1 behind to beat Stuttgart with two late goals. No prize for guessing the scorer of the winning goal.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Stuttgart vs. Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Stuttgart vs. Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Sebastian Hoeneß has many reasons to remain with Stuttgart
arts.sum: An interesting article in Germany's preeminent footballing publication suggests that Sebastian Hoeneß may be staying put in Swabia this offseason.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs Bayer Leverkusen preview: Visitors desperate to end losing streak
arts.sum: Champions Bayer Leverkusen must secure victory on Sunday as they head to MHPArena to face Stuttgart in their 26th Bundesliga match of the season.
